title: Lemon Poppy Seed Scones (Gluten Free, Dairy Free, and Vegan)

instructions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet.
instructions.2: Whisk water and ground flax seeds together in a small bowl. Let stand until thickened, about 5 minutes. Mix in maple syrup, coconut oil, lemon zest, lemon juice, and vanilla extract.
instructions.3: Mix oat flour, white rice flour, brown rice flour, coconut flour, poppy seeds, baking soda, baking powder, xanthan gum, and salt together in a large bowl. Add maple syrup mixture; mix with a spatula until dough comes together in a ball.
instructions.4: Transfer ball of dough to a large sheet of waxed paper; press into a circle about 1 inch thick. Cut into 8 wedges. Pull wedges apart and carefully transfer to the prepared baking sheet.
instructions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 15 to 17 minutes. Cool on a wire rack.

Is maple syrup from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is dough from Step 3 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
